articles.description: The ‘Let’s Go!’ feature is a game changer for people who don’t want to fight a million Lechonks
articles.content: Yesterday, the official Pokémon website announced that Novembers Scarlet and Violet will introduce an auto-battle feature to the long-running creature-collecting series. Called Lets Go!, the feature … [+1918 chars]

articles.author: Rita Liao
articles.title: Huawei offers satellite SOS in China where Apple’s is unavailable - TechCrunch
articles.description: A day before Apple unveiled its highly anticipated satellite-powered SOS feature for iPhone 14, Huawei announced its own equivalent. The Chinese telecoms equipment and smartphone giant said its flagship Mate 50 series will support texting via satellite commun…
